sentences.en: Abstract: articlethe first to study on pharmacokinetic and eliminate of OTC in turbot after oral administration.
sentences.cn: 摘要: 首次研究大菱鲆口服土霉素的药代动力学特征及残留消除规律.

sentences.en: Both wild and farmed turbot prices are expected to decrease mainly in the smallest sizes.
sentences.cn: 但无论是野生的大菱鲆还是养殖大菱鲆,价格下降的都主要是小规格鱼.

sentences.en: FLATFISH: Low sales for turbot during the past months have led to a price drop. Moreover, substitute products are still showing lower prices when compared with turbot.
sentences.cn: 鲽鱼：大菱前几个月交易量偏低，导致价格下降。而且，一些可替代产品在与大菱的竞争中又降低了价格。

sentences.en: Flounder, turbot and sea bream are all the important marine - culture fishes in China.
sentences.cn: 牙鲆 、 大菱鲆、真鲷是当前我国重要的海水养殖鱼类.

sentences.en: Low sales for turbot during the past months have led to a price drop.
sentences.cn: 大菱前几个月交易量偏低,导致价格下降.

sentences.en: Moreover, substitute products are still showing lower prices when compared with turbot.
sentences.cn: 而且, 一些可替代产品在与大菱的竞争中又降低了价格.

sentences.en: The adenosine triphosphatease ( ATPase ) gene of turbot reddish body iridovirus ( TRBIV ) was cloned and sequenced.
sentences.cn: 克隆了大菱鲆红体病虹彩病毒 ( TRBIV ) 的重要功能蛋白———腺苷三磷酸酶(adenosinetriphosphatease,ATPase ) 基因的全部编码区及其上下游部分的核苷酸序列.

sentences.en: We can get the most wonderful red clams, eels and frogs' legs, kingfish, turbot and live hamachi (yellowtail tuna).
sentences.cn: 我们可以得到最上乘的蛤蜊、鳝鱼、田鸡腿、无鳔石首鱼、大比目鱼和活油甘鱼（黄色尾巴的金枪鱼）。
